Package gobblin.metrics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextAwareMetric
    An interface for a type of Metrics that are aware of their MetricContext and can have associated Tags.
    ContextAwareMetricFactory<T extends ContextAwareMetric>
    An interface for factory classes for ContextAwareMetrics.
    Taggable
    An interface for classes with which Tags can be associated.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextAwareGauge<T>
    A type of Gauges that that are aware of their MetricContext and can have associated Tags.
    ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareCounterFactory
    A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareCounters.
    ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareHistogramFactory
    A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareHistograms.
    ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareMeterFactory
    A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareMeters.
    ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareTimerFactory
    A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareTimers.
    Counters<E extends Enum<E>>
    Class that holds Counters for each value of an enum.
    GobblinTrackingEvent  
    GobblinTrackingEvent.Builder
    RecordBuilder for GobblinTrackingEvent instances.
    InnerCounter
    Implementation of InnerMetric for Counter.
    InnerGauge<T>
    Implementation of InnerMetric for Gauge.
    InnerHistogram
    Implementation of InnerMetric for Histogram.
    InnerMeter
    Implementation of InnerMetric for Meter.
    InnerMetricContext
    Contains list of Metrics, Tags, as well as references to parent and child MetricContext for a MetricContext.
    InnerTimer
    Implementation of InnerMetric for Timer.
    Metric  
    Metric.Builder
    RecordBuilder for Metric instances.
    MetricContext
    This class models a MetricSet that optionally has a list of Tags and a set of ScheduledReporters associated with it.
    MetricContext.Builder
    A builder class for MetricContext.
    MetricReport  
    MetricReport.Builder
    RecordBuilder for MetricReport instances.
    RootMetricContext
    Special singleton MetricContext used as the root of the MetricContext tree.
    Tag<T>
    A class representing a dimension or property associated with a Taggable.
    TagBasedMetricFilter
    A type of MetricFilters that matches Metrics of type Taggable that have some given Tags.
    Tagged
    A base implementation of Taggable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Measurements
    A enumeration of different measurements of metrics.
